title: Hidden Field Patch
description:
The fake login form captures extra hidden data.

Objective: Identify and remove any malicious hidden form fields, then validate server-side.
dialogue: Mira: "I noticed some hidden fields in the login form. That could be used to steal info!"
Mira: "Can you help me find and remove any malicious hidden fields?"
hints: View source to locate <input type=hidden> fields.
Use Burp Suite or browser dev-tools.
